发出来我帮你看看# Configuration file

"base damage" {
    # If BaseDamage is set to true, all mobs will deal 1.0 piercing damage (ignores armor).
    S:" "= 
    B:BaseDamage=true
}


general {
    # Spawn Rate. Set to 0 to disable mob from spawning. Recommended: 10> Day, <100 Night
